## Biscuits

```{r}
source("R/functions.R")
```

```{r}
recipes <- readxl::read_excel("recipes.xlsx")
```


```{r}
#| output: asis
#| echo: false


res <- purrr::map_chr(unique(recipes$name), \(recipe) {
    knitr::knit_child(
      input = "child-dir/_child.qmd", 
      envir = environment(), 
      quiet = TRUE
      )
  })

cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
